hero_tagline: I am not a resource. I am a creator.
f1_desc: Reclaiming status as a Living Man under Natural Law. Rejection of the 'Person' fiction.
f2_desc: Creator of UCTS, Solar-H2, and Moss Tile. Building the future of energy.
f3_desc: Survived genocide, war, and systemic oppression. From Donbass to German bureaucracy.
manifesto: We must save ourselves as humans to save humanity. I am the seed.
port_hero: Building infrastructure for a sovereign future.
ucts_desc: Turning toxic red mud into energy storage.
detailed_history_body:
### 1993-2001: Citizenship Trap

My childhood was marked by a legal anomaly. Holding two passports (Ukraine/Russia) due to the USSR collapse, I became a hostage of a system that used this collision as a weapon against my sovereignty.

### 2014: War in Donbass

War took my home, my family, and my sense of stability. After 2014, my property was illegally alienated. This was the beginning of my journey as a human who must defend his right to exist.

### 2017: Engineering Breakthrough

I did not give up. Creating the UCTS prototype was the result of my desire to turn destruction into energy. Seeking independent energy solutions.

### 2021: Global Recognition

The world recognized my developments. The Solar-H2 patent confirmed that my ideas could save the maritime industry. Worldwide validation of my projects.

### 2023: Eco-Integration

Development of Moss Tile ‚Äî a natural urban cooling system. Integrating technology with nature.

### 2024: Systemic Oppression

Today I am fighting against bureaucratic oppression in Germany. Deprivation of rights to medical assistance and movement is a modern form of torture. But I am a Living Man, and I continue to create.
